EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners- Follow up (1323709067.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4
Dear Ralph,
I hope you had a nice weekend! I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding MBO Partners as you had expressed interest in using our services when we spoke a few months ago. Any update would be great and I look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
Nicolette
Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: manciner [mailto:manciner@comcast.net] Sent: Monday, October 10, 2011 7:27 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: 'Mancinelli, Ralph' Subject: RE:
Hi Nicolette, thanks and what again were the pay period options…weekly, monthly etc…Regards, Ralph
